Bobcat2022
Outwit, Perplex, and the SHIELD TA, protected by Stealth. After "25 points," the numbers don't really even matter here (though it's nice that the common 'hit for three' will cycle her back around to her damage SP). No one needs help to know that this piece is useful. Why does this unit even have a comments section?

April 3, 2022
hoojeebo
I get it, having the SHIELD TA but not the keyword does feel weird, but SHIELD had been disbanded in the MCU for quite a while by the time this show aired, so I like the thematic choice of focusing on the SWORD keyword in this set. Plus that really helps flesh out that keyword, which has been minimally represented before Disney+.
